channel.title: 317 potion
channel.description: kk on my server i want to add a overload potion. the potion will be fishing pot anyone know how to do it? if you drink, it will give you 124 str,atk, def

item.title: 317 potion
item.dc:creator: @Rilex Rilex
item.description:
@Rilex wrote:

I found out that is for Delta. Im using Project Insanity.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 potion
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

First error is missing the second quotation, so it can't be applied to the sendMessage method. (Which you said)
what do you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 potion
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

                        sendMessage("Welcome to Alison);

this one’s wrong, you forgot to close the string… it should be:

sendMesage("Welcome to Alison");
                        sendMessage("You must sign up on the forums"+ Config.CLI
ENT_DOWNLOAD);

i don’t know about this on, was this always working?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 potion
item.dc:creator: @Rilex Rilex
item.description:
@Rilex wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:347581”]potions.java, add this:

case POTION ID HERE: // overload potion
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.strPot = true;
c.strPotTimer = 20;
c.setAnimation(829);
c.playerLevel[2] = 124;
c.playerLevel[1] = 124;
c.playerLevel[0] = 124;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4008);
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
c.deleteItem(POTION ID HERE, slot, 1);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[1] + "", 4008);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[0] + "", 4004);
c.strPotTimer = 60;
				if(c.currentHealth <= 0) {
				break;
				}
				c.sM("You drink some of your strength potion.");
				c.sM("Your potion disappears after you drink it."); 
break;

try that and post any errors.[/quote]

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

potions.java, add this:

case POTION ID HERE: // overload potion
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.strPot = true;
c.strPotTimer = 20;
c.setAnimation(829);
